name: Two Worlds (itch) (LaWosch)
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022

Theme: "It is not real"

Concept:
You can change between two worlds to help the Rabbit reach the Carrot. By this you choose what is and what is not real.

Controls: 
WASD or Arrows - Move
Spacebar - Change Worlds
R - Restart current level
M - Restart from the beginning (Level 1)

Note:
Playing in fullscreen is advised

Credits:
Art for Rabbit and Carrot by Kenney from the Kenney Jumper Pack
Sound from the Kenney Impact Sounds Pack
Sound from Zapsplat.com
